import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-scroll' function Header() { const [showNav, setShowNav] = useState(false) const [hide, setHide] = useState("hidden") const show = () => { setShowNav(pre => !pre) } console.log(showNav) return (
Rukundo Ronaldo
Home My work About
) } export default Header
